T02D1505:272a-1: shr'i tsa kra sam'a ra tatta garbha sam gra ha /
T02D1505:272a-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa /
T02D1505:272a-4: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1505:272a-5: gdod nas dag cing gdod nas grol //
T02D1505:272a-6: gdod nas zhi ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1505:272a-7: dngos po kun gyi de bzhin nyid //
T02D1505:272a-9: blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' //
T02D1505:272a-10: brjod 'das tshig gis mtshon min par //
T02D1505:272a-11: rang ri rig pa'i ye shes ni //
T02D1505:272a-12: gnyis med gsal ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1505:272a-13: gang zhig dri mas bsgribs pa'i sems //
T02D1505:272a-14: yul du snang ba'i rjes 'jug pa //
T02D1505:272a-15: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ste //
T02D1505:272a-16: chags sdang rnam rmongs las la ni //
T02D1505:272a-17: rnam g-yeng sdug bsngal dang bcas pa'i //
T02D1505:272a-19: gang gis bla ma'i drin thob nas //
T02D1505:272a-20: sems kyi de nyid rig pa gang //
T02D1505:272a-21: ri dbang rtse nas lhung ba ltar //
T02D1505:272a-22: grol ba'i thabs ni bla na med //
T02D1505:272a-23: gzhan du dka' thub mi bzad sogs //
T02D1505:272a-24: lus nyon mongs par byed pa yis //
T02D1505:272a-25: thar ba'i 'bras bu mi rnyed par //
T02D1505:272a-27: gang gis sems kyi de nyid rig / de las gzhan du grol ba'i thabs //
T02D1505:272a-28: bzlas dang bsam gtan la sogs pa //
T02D1505:272a-29: pha rol sgrol ba'i gru bzhin 'dor //
T02D1505:272a-30: de bas bzlas med bsam gtan dang //
T02D1505:272a-31: dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med //
T02D1505:272b-1: rang rig ye shes gcig pu nyid //
T02D1505:272b-2: rnam thar bzhi yi rang bzhin dang //
T02D1505:272b-3: dus gsum mkhyen pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1505:272b-4: rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa yis //
T02D1505:272b-5: zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid //
T02D1505:272b-6: thabs dang shes rab dbyer med sku //
T02D1505:272b-7: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun //
T02D1505:272b-8: gcig bu'i nyams ni du ma'i gar //
T02D1505:272b-10: gang gis de yongs shes pa yis //
T02D1505:272b-11: rang bzhin de ni rtogs 'gyur na //
T02D1505:272b-12: gzhan du spros pa sna tshogs kyang //
T02D1505:272b-13: grol ba'i rgyu nyid kho na'o //
T02D1505:272b-14: de phyir rang rig mtshon ba yi ;
T02D1505:272b-15: / thabs kyi spros pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D1505:272b-16: gangg'a'i rgya mtsho'i ro bzhin du //
T02D1505:272b-17: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin byed //
T02D1505:272b-18: de bas gang gis thabs rig pas //
T02D1505:272b-19: bsam gtan la ni mngon par gzhol //
T02D1505:272b-20: gzings la legs par sbyor ba ltar //
T02D1505:272b-21: sems kyi de nyid mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D1505:272b-22: 'dir ni phung po khams rnams dang //
T02D1505:272b-23: skye mched drug las rnam grol ba //
T02D1505:272b-24: sgyu ma'i gzugs la legs gnas pa'i //
T02D1505:272b-25: ae bam rtsa yi 'khor lo la //
T02D1505:272b-26: bcu drug thog mar thig ler bcas //
T02D1505:272b-27: dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa la //
T02D1505:272b-28: dbyangs kyi drug pa dang ldan pa //
T02D1505:272b-29: zla phyed thig les rnam par mdzes//
T02D1505:272b-30: dbyangs yig bcu gsum thig les brgyan //
T02D1505:272b-31: ya tshogs brgyad pa'i mtha' gnas pa //
T02D1505:272b-32: gzhom med bde ba che rang bzhin //
T02D1505:272b-33: n'a da thig le dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1505:272b-34: srog dang rtsol ba legs bsdams te //
T02D1505:272b-35: sprul par rlung lnga bcings pa yis //
T02D1505:272b-36: du ba la sogs rtags mthong nas ;
T02D1505:272b-37: / ye shes me ni rnam par 'bar //
T02D1505:272b-38: glog gi 'od dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02D1505:272b-39: gsal ba'i gzugs can gyen 'gro bas //
T02D1505:272b-40: stang nas byang chub sems blangs te //
T02D1505:272b-42: lte bar gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug las //
T02D1505:272b-43: ye shes skyes gang rang bzhin ni //
T02D1505:272b-44: 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1505:272b-45: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs shing //
T02D1505:272b-46: chags dang chags med 'dres gyur pa'i //
T02D1505:272b-47: lhan skyes yang dag byang chub nyid //
T02D1505:272b-48: zla ba nyi ma'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D1505:272b-49: nam mkha' sems gcig gyur pa las //
T02D1505:273a-0: rlung rnams ma lus der bcings @273a * //
T02D1505:273a-2: / yid ni ri bong lngar gnas byed //
T02D1505:273a-3: nyin dang mtshan mo rnams spangs shing //
T02D1505:273a-5: dus gsum mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02D1505:273a-6: bsam gyis mi khyab bde ba che //
T02D1505:273a-7: rang bzhin gnyug ma lhan cig skyes //
T02D1505:273a-8: dngos po kun gyi de kho na //
T02D1505:273a-9: sems kyi de nyid mthong ba po //
T02D1505:273a-10: rang bzhin gyis ni rnam dag pa //
T02D1505:273a-11: gzung 'dzin dri bral mngon sangs rgyas //
T02D1505:273a-12: dmigs med snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1505:273a-13: 'khor ba ji srid gnas kyi bar //
T02D1505:273a-14: 'gyur ba med pa'i ngo bos bzhugs //
T02D1505:273a-15: rin chen sems las gzhan gyur pa //
T02D1505:273a-17: sems kyi de nyid rig pa la //
T02D1505:273a-19: dpal ldan mgon po spyod 'chang ba'i //
T02D1505:273a-20: drin gyis rtogs pa de nyid gang //
T02D1505:273a-21: gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i snying po yis //
T02D1505:273a-22: 'gro ba'i sgrib shes sgrib sel shog / dpal 'khor
T02D1505:273a-23: lo sdom pa'i snying po de kho na nyid bsdus
T02D1505:273a-24: pa slob dpon ku sa li bas mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1505:273a-26: / rdo rje slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug dang /
